MWC.GUI.Shapes

Interface HasDraggableComponents

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArcShape, CircleShape, CompositeTrackWrapper, DynamicPolygonShapeWrapper, DynamicShapeWrapper, LineShape, PolygonShape, PolygonWrapper, RectangleShape, ShapeWrapper, TrackWrapper, VectorShape

    public interface HasDraggableComponents
    marker interface for objects that can be dragged on-screen
    Author:
    ian.mayo

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  HasDraggableComponents.ComponentConstruct
      composite object used for finding nearest dragable items

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        void paint(CanvasType dest)
        paint the shape onto the destination. note that the subject knows where to plot itself to
        Parameters:
        dest - - the place to paint to

      • shift

           WorldVector vector)

      • findNearestHotSpotIn

        void findNearestHotSpotIn(java.awt.Point cursorPos,
                          WorldLocation cursorLoc,
                          HasDraggableComponents.ComponentConstruct currentNearest,
                          Layer parentLayer)
        ok - see how far we are from the cursor
        Parameters:
        cursorPos - the current mouse cursor position
        cursorLoc - that position in world coordinates
        currentNearest - the 'running total' of nearest points
        parentLayer - the layer to update when drag is complete

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        get the name of the item, so we can place a detailed description on the undo buffer
        Returns:
        name of this item
